UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel peptides from skins of amphibians showed broad-spectrum antimicrobial activities.
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Zhang Y, Lee WH, Yang X, Zhang Y

Literature.Title: Modification Targeting the "Rana Box" Motif of a Novel Nigrocin Peptide From Hylarana latouchii Enhances and Broadens Its Potency Against Multiple Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Bao K, Yuan W, Ma C, Yu X, Wang L, Hong M, Xi X, Zhou M, Chen T
